name: Villa Bird
error_check_in: check in must be before check out
error_check_out: check out must be after check in
error_Check_in_after_today: Check in date cannot be before today
error_Check_out_after_today: Check out date cannot be before today
guest_favorite_desc: This home is a guest favorite based on ratings, reviews, and reliability
personal_info_desc: Provide personal details and how we can reach you
login_and_security_desc: Update your password and secure your account
payments_and_payouts_desc: Review payments, payouts, coupons, and gift cards
taxes_desc: Manage taxpayer information and tax documents
notifications_desc: Choose notification preferences and how you want to be contacted
global_preferences_desc: Set your default language, currency, and timezone
travel_for_work_desc: Add a work email for business trip benefits
referral_credit_and_coupon_desc: You have $0 referral credits and coupons
professional_hosting_tools_desc: Get professional tools if you manage several properties on Trent
personal_info_card_title_1: Why isn’t my info shown here?
personal_info_card_text_1: We’re hiding some account details to protect your identity.
personal_info_card_text_2: Contact info and personal details can be edited. If this info was used to verify your identity.
login_and_security_card_text: We regularly review accounts to make sure they’re secure as possible. We’ll also let you know if there’s more we can do to increase the security of your account.
global_preferences_card_desc: Changing your currency updates how you see prices. You can change how you get payments in your payments & payouts preferences.
get_started_to_host: It’s easy to get started on Trent
tell_us_about_your_place_desc: Share some basic info, like where it is and how many guests can stay.
make_it_stand_out_desc: Add 5 or more photos plus a title and description—we’ll help you out.
finish_up_and_publish_desc: Choose a starting price, verify a few details, then publish your listing.
describe_your_place: Which of these best describes your place?
type_of_place: What type of place will guests have?
entire_place_desc: Guests have the whole place to themselves.
room_desc: Guests have their own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces.
shared_room: A shared room in a hotel
shared_room_desc: Guests sleep in a shared room in a professionally managed hostel with staff onsite 24/7.
location_of_place_desc: Your address is only shared with guests after they’ve made a reservation.
Failed_to_access_location: Failed to access location. Please enable GPS.
floor_plan: Share some basics about your place
floor_plan_desc: You'll add more details later, like bed types.
about_your_place_desc: In this step, we'll ask you which type of property you have and if guests will book the entire place or just a room. Then let us know the location and how many guests can stay.
stand_out_desc: In this step, you’ll add some of the amenities your place offers, plus 5 or more photos. Then, you’ll create a title and description.
tell_us_about_amenities: Tell guests what your place has to offer
finish_setup_desc: Finally, you'll choose booking settings, set up pricing, and publish your listing.
photos_for_property: Add some photos of your house
photos_for_property_desc: You'll need at least 5 photos to get started. You can add more or make changes later.
title_for_property: Now, let's give your house a title
title_for_property_desc: Short titles work best. Have fun with it—you can always change it later.
title_for_property_placeholder: Write a unique title for your property
desc_for_property_desc: أخبرنا ما الذي يميز عقارك عن غيره.
instant_book_desc: You can change this at any time.
approve_your_first_5_bookings_desc: Start by reviewing reservations requests, then switch to Instant Book, so guests can book automatically.
visibility: Choose who to welcome for your first reservation
visibility_desc: After your first guest, anyone can book your place.
any_Trent_guest_desc: Get reservations when you welcome anyone from the Trent community.
an_experienced guest_desc: For your first guest, welcome someone with a good track record on Trent who can offer tips for how to be a great Host.
add_discounts_desc: Help your place stand out to get booked faster and earn your first reviews.
weekly_discount_desc: For stays of 7 nights or more
monthly_discount_desc: For stays of 28 nights or more
how_are_you_hosting_on_Trent: How are you hosting on Trent?
how_are_you_hosting_on_Trent_title_1: I'm hosting as a private individual
does_your_place_have_any_of_these: Does your place have any of these?
become_a_host_finish_up_desc: Once this is done, you can publish your listing and start getting booked.
does_every_bedroom_have_a_lock: Does every bedroom have a lock?
what_kind_of_bathrooms_are_available_to_: What kind of bathrooms are available to guests?
private_and_attached_desc: It’s connected to the guest’s room and is just for them.
dedicated_desc: It’s private, but accessed via a shared space, like a hallway.
occupancy_desc: Guests need to know whether they’ll encounter other people during their stay.
occupancy_result: We’ll show this information on your listing and in search results.
